a legendary 'must play' game

volvo where portal 3
GLADOS MAMA WOOF WOOF ARF ARF BARK BARK BARK BARK ZAMNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
A classic for a reason. And I do like its sense of humour.

Portal 2 is a 3D puzzle platformer where you play as Chell a test subject who is trapped in aperture labs. The goal is to beat Glados and Wheatley or in the multiplayer finish all the tests. Obviously you have a portal gun which is the main mechanic of the game. There is a lot of community made levels so if you get bored of the main campaign you can get portal reloaded. In conclusion go buy portal 2 (:
Life was good at Aperture Science.
Portal 2 is one of the greatest games of all time. The story is brilliantly written, the voice acting is phenomenal, and the game is an all-around masterpiece.
It was really fun! The game play is engaging and atmospheric.
The Gameplay Is Fresh Amazing Level Editor With Endless Ideas And The StoryLine Is Great And The Co-Op Is The Best! I Even Found A New Friend By Playing It!

This game is a masterpiece that made my monke brain work incredibly hard. This managed to stimulate all of my remaining 2 braincells. 12/10 still wish i could have destroyed more of Wheatley's monitors.
